member.param: RextOption to configure http call using object

member.name: T:Rext.CustomHttpResponse
member.summary: Custom Rext response for every http call

member.name: P:Rext.CustomHttpResponse.IsSuccess
member.summary: This is true if the http repsonse code is 200

member.name: P:Rext.CustomHttpResponse.StatusCode
member.summary: The Http StatusCode associated with the call response

member.name: P:Rext.CustomHttpResponse.Content
member.summary: Plain string response from the http call

member.name: P:Rext.CustomHttpResponse.Message
member.summary: Rext message on the status of the request and also shows handled exception messages

member.name: T:Rext.CustomHttpResponse`1
member.summary: Generic response that allows object to be deserialized to specified type of T

member.name: P:Rext.CustomHttpResponse`1.Data
member.summary: Generic type of T for response to be deserialized

member.name: T:Rext.CertificateInfo
member.summary: Certificate model class

member.name: P:Rext.CertificateInfo.FilePath
member.summary: File path to certificate on machine. This is used ahead of CertificateBytes if a value is provided for both

member.name: P:Rext.CertificateInfo.Password
member.summary: Certificate password if any

member.name: P:Rext.CertificateInfo.CertificateBytes
member.summary: Certificate byte content

member.name: T:Rext.RextConfigurationBundle
member.summary: RextConfigurationBundle class

member.name: P:Rext.RextConfigurationBundle.HttpConfiguration
member.summary: Configure httpclient and actions

member.name: P:Rext.RextConfigurationBundle.HttpClient
member.summary: Create a custom client for usage. This will discard every setting in RextHttpCongifuration.HttpConfiguration

member.name: P:Rext.RextConfigurationBundle.SuppressRextExceptions
member.summary: This allow you to retrieve exception messages in RextHttpClient.Message. Set to false if you want to handle all exceptions from your code

member.name: P:Rext.RextConfigurationBundle.BeforeCall
member.summary: Execute action before any http call

member.name: P:Rext.RextConfigurationBundle.AfterCall
member.summary: Execute action after any http call

member.name: P:Rext.RextConfigurationBundle.OnError
member.summary: Execute action when an exception is thrown by RextHttpClient

member.name: P:Rext.RextConfigurationBundle.OnStatusCode
member.summary: Execute action for a specific statuscode

member.name: P:Rext.RextConfigurationBundle.StatusCodesToHandle
member.summary: Array for all statuscodes to run custom action for

member.name: P:Rext.RextConfigurationBundle.EnableStopwatch
member.summary: Determine if Rext Stopwatch should be used. Value is True by default

member.name: T:Rext.RextHttpCongifuration
member.summary: RextHttpCongifuration class

member.name: P:Rext.RextHttpCongifuration.BaseUrl
member.summary: Set the base url for every http call

member.name: P:Rext.RextHttpCongifuration.ProxyAddress
member.summary: Set a proxy address when behind a corporate network eg: http://127.0.0.1:80. Mostly valid for development mode. Value should be passed from a dynamic setting

member.name: P:Rext.RextHttpCongifuration.Header
member.summary: Set a default header for every http call via IDictionary(string, string) IList(string, string) or key-value object (new { Authorization = "xxxx" }

member.name: P:Rext.RextHttpCongifuration.RelaxSslCertValidation
member.summary: If set to true, httpclient will be configured to ignore SSL validations. This is useful when using selfsigned certificates

member.name: P:Rext.RextHttpCongifuration.ThrowExceptionIfNotSuccessResponse
member.summary: If set to true, an exception is thrown whenever httpclient returns a statuscode other than 200

member.name: P:Rext.RextHttpCongifuration.ThrowExceptionOnDeserializationFailure
member.summary: If set to true, an exception is thrown whenever a response deserialization fails

member.name: P:Rext.RextHttpCongifuration.Timeout
member.summary: Http timeout in seconds

member.name: P:Rext.RextHttpCongifuration.Certificate
member.summary: Add a X509Certificate to the HttpClient

member.name: P:Rext.RextHttpCongifuration.HttpCompletionOption
member.summary: Set the global HttpClient HttpCompletionOption call for every call. Default value is HttpCompletionOption.ResponseContentRead

member.name: T:Rext.RextOptions
member.summary: RextOptions class

member.name: P:Rext.RextOptions.Url
member.summary: Request url in full

member.name: P:Rext.RextOptions.Method
member.summary: Http verb to use, e.g GET, POST, DELETE

member.name: P:Rext.RextOptions.Payload
member.summary: Content to send. Can be a single/complex object, list, keyvalue pair or more, depending on the api request

member.name: P:Rext.RextOptions.Header
member.summary: Set a default header for every http call via IDictionary(string, string), IList(string, string) or key-value object (new { Authorization = "xxxx" }

member.name: P:Rext.RextOptions.ContentType
member.summary: The data format of your payload

member.name: P:Rext.RextOptions.ExpectedResponseFormat
member.summary: The expected data format of the response

member.name: P:Rext.RextOptions.ThrowExceptionIfNotSuccessResponse
member.summary: If set to true, a exception is thrown whenever httpclient returns a statuscode other than 200

member.name: P:Rext.RextOptions.ThrowExceptionOnDeserializationFailure
member.summary: If set to true, an exception is thrown whenever a response deserialization fails

member.name: P:Rext.RextOptions.IsStreamResponse
member.summary: Set to true if you are expecting Http response

member.name: P:Rext.RextOptions.HttpCompletionOption
member.summary: Set the HttpClient HttpCompletionOption call. Default value is HttpCompletionOption.ResponseContentRead
